indic_aug.lm package¶

indic_aug.lm.fetch(lang)[source]¶

Fetches pretrained language model (refer: Arora [1]) from remote Dropbox source.

Parameters

lang (str) – ISO 639-1 code for language for which to retrieve language model.

indic_aug.lm.load(lang)[source]¶

Loads language model if already downloaded, else downloads and loads.

Parameters

lang (str) – ISO 639-1 code for language for which to load language model.

Returns

Language model

Return type

fastai.text.learner.LanguageLearner

Submodules¶

indic_aug.lm.load module¶

indic_aug.lm.load.fetch(lang)[source]¶

Fetches pretrained language model (refer: Arora [1]) from remote Dropbox source.

Parameters

indic_aug.lm.load.load(lang)[source]¶

Loads language model if already downloaded, else downloads and loads.

Returns
